properties.name: source
properties.description: String, required. Icon name for icons from src/icons folder or an `<svg>...</svg>` code

properties.name: size
properties.description: String. Must be valid css value. Size for the inner svg element.

properties.name: padding
properties.description: String. Must be valid css value. Padding around the svg.

properties.name: color
properties.description: String. Color variable name or a CSS value

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: Responsible for displaying tooltip on mouseover event on Icon
